channel.title: Help?

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

Ok well i added godsword shards so that they could be added together to make a godsword, but when i use one shard on the other, nothing happens. heres my code:

if(itemUsed == 15341 && useWith == 15342) { deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1); deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1); addItem(15329, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15341 && useWith == 15343) { deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1); deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1); addItem(15330, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15342 && useWith == 15341) { deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1); deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1); addItem(15329, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15343 && useWith == 15341) { deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1); deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1); addItem(15330, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15342 && useWith == 15343) { deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1); deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1); addItem(15332, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15343 && useWith == 15342) { deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1); deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1); addItem(15332, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15329 && useWith == 15343) { deleteItem(15329, getItemSlot(15329), 1); deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1); addItem(15331, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15343 && useWith == 15329) { deleteItem(15343, getItemSlot(15343), 1); deleteItem(15329, getItemSlot(15329), 1); addItem(15331, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15330 && useWith == 15342) { deleteItem(15330, getItemSlot(15330), 1); deleteItem(15342, getItemSlot(15342), 1); addItem(15331, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15341 && useWith == 15332) { deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1); deleteItem(15332, getItemSlot(15332), 1); addItem(15331, 1); } else if(itemUsed == 15332 && useWith == 15341) { deleteItem(15332, getItemSlot(15332), 1); deleteItem(15341, getItemSlot(15341), 1); addItem(15331, 1); } }

Read full topic
